docs  LICENSE  Makefile  MANIFEST.in  mistune  pyproject.toml  README.md  README.rst  requirements-docs.txt  setup.cfg  syntax.md  tests

It does not have the setup.py file but has the pyproject.toml file. How can I compile it?

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: py-mistune: version 2.0.0 build fails on centos8_aarch64
